name: Snacky Frog
description:
Snacky Frog is a simulation game where you must snag as many prizes as you can from the machine!

Sometimes the machine can be quite finicky. Do your best to keep your prize inside the arrows!

CONTROLS:

Left/Right arrow keys: To move

Spacebar: Drop the frog

Up/Down arrow keys: Balance the frog

This game was created for Wholesome Games Jam 2020

Theme: Don't Give up!

https://itch.io/jam/wholesome-games-jam-2020

Made by: Éloïse Laroche, Nathan Garduno, Seb Boulton, and Jessie Alvarez!
